description: This pasta salad ticks all the boxes: zesty, salty and nutty. Pancetta, pine nuts and broccolini combine to create a pasta salad recipe the family will keep requesting.
name: Broccolini Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk remaining oil, zest and lemon juice in a jug. Season to taste. Add to salad and toss to combine. Transfer to a serving bowl. Break pancetta into pieces and add to pasta with pine nuts and basil. Serve.
